resources.string: Reloaded mode, 7 units + 1 incinerator and powerup
Guest accounts has limited app functions. Are you sure to continue as guest?
GPS is disabled. Do you want to activate it?
You don\'t have enough Sunny Points
You don\'t have enough Unit Points
Are you scure you want to exit?\nUnsaved progress will be lost.
Create 3 objects \nof highest level \nin the Ewaste unit
Unlock level 3 of \nthe Glass Recycle Unit
There is an active power up on this unit
Please wait while scores are processed \nor your opponent to complete the game.
It is possible to make nails from recycled metal
It is possible to make kitchenware (pots, mokas) from recycled metal
It is possible to make gym equipment (weights, dumbbells) from recycled metal
It is possible to make construction materials (steel beams) from recycled metal
It is possible to make new tin cans from recycled aluminium
It is possible to make everyday obejcts (travel mugs, bottles) from recycled aluminium
It is possible to make houshold objects (stepladder, chairs) from recycled aluminium
It is possible to make car components (rims, engine block) from recycled aluminium
It is possible to make paper sheets and newspapers from recycled paper
It is possible to make notebooks and books from recycled paper
It is possible to make paper bags and envelopes from recycled paper
It is possible to make paper boxes from recycled paper
It is possible to salvage copper from electronic waste
It is possible to salvage aluminium from electronic waste
It is possible to salvage silver from electronic waste
It is possible to salvage gold from electronic waste
It is possible to make plastic cups from recycled plastic
It is possible to make bottles and containers from recycled plastic
It is possible to make shells for electroinic devices from recycled plastic
It is possible to make ordinary objects (chairs, boxes) from recycled plastic
It is possible to produce fertilizer from organic waste
"It is possible to make jars and glass containers from recycled glass "
"It is possible to make new glass bottles from recycled glass "
"It is possible to make decorative glass vases from recycled glass "
"It is possible to make glass panels from recycled glass "

Based on: The (H)ill 

Developed for 
Sviluppo di Mobile Software 
Year 2021/22 

Alessandro Rossi - Mat.: 709241 
Andrea Tarulli - Mat.: 704224 
Sabrina Pinto - Mat.: 707173 
Federica Pellegrino - Mat.: 656874
To start a multiplayer match bluetooth and location permissions are required
Select glass unit to build it
Select glass unit to open its menu
Upgrade this unit to unlock \na new processing slot \nand better recycled objects
Your goal will be to recycle the litter falling on the hill \nbefore they reach the red line
Now try to build the first unit
Click here to open \nthe units menu
Now let\'s try to recycle. \nDrag some glass to the newly built unit.

As soon as the unit 
will have finished processing the item 
you will have enough unit points to upgrade it. 
Open the units menu to do so.

Recycled items will produce sunny points. 
You can spend these 
to build new units 
or use the inciniretor

The incinerator is a special unit: 
It will process any type of litter 
at the cost of 2 sunny points. 
Spending 3 sunny points 
you will be able to use 
it's special ability: 
shake your phone to burn 
all the litter at the base of the hill
Now try to shake the phone \nor drag an item on the incinerator
